channel.title: Wireshark on Hackerman's Hacking Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Wireshark on Hackerman's Hacking Tutorials

item.title: DVTA - Part 3 - Network Recon
item.description:
In this part, we will focus on network traffic. More often than not, thick client applications have some sort of network connectivity. They talk to some server(s) to do things.

Previous parts are:

  • DVTA - Part 1 - Setup
  • DVTA - Part 2 - Cert Pinning and Login Button
